abstract: Are roundups of wild horses in the best interest of the horses, or the ecosystem, in the Central Plains? The answer is complicated, some suggest.
snippet: Are roundups of wild horses in the best interest of the horses, or the ecosystem, in the Central Plains? The answer is complicated, some suggest.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: My first wild horse sighting came when a coworker and I, navigating a barely visible dirt road in our big Forest Service truck this summer, had just reached the crest of a ridge on our way to survey a remote wilderness area in eastern Nevada.
